p: As a result of laboratory confirmation by molecular surveys, the overall estimate of the combined frequency of CDV infection was 33% (95% CI: 23–43), with considerable evidence for regional epidemiological variations (Figs 3A and 2). For serological surveys (antibody survey anti-CDV), the pooled frequency was 46% (95% CI: 36–57), while analysis based on antigenic results was 37% (95% CI: 25–50).
